summary.span: 包含运行时跟踪基础结构在匹配了 时发送到跟踪服务的数据。

span.span: Contains the data sent to the tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when it matches a .

span.span: It is also used in the return list of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当运行时跟踪基础结构匹配了 中的 时，它会通过与跟踪服务关联的 将 发送到该跟踪服务。When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a in a , it sends a to the tracking service over the associated with that tracking service. 跟踪服务可以执行需要对跟踪记录中的数据执行的任何操作。The tracking service can perform whatever action is necessary on the data in the tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventDateTime` 用协调世界时 (UTC) 表示。`eventDateTime` is expressed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). `eventOrder` 在工作流实例内保证是唯一的；但不保证它是连续的。`eventOrder` is guaranteed to be unique within the workflow instance; however, it is not guaranteed to be sequential. 该构造函数由运行时跟踪基础结构调用。This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，其中包含与某些类型的工作流状态事件关联的附加数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an that contains additional data associated with certain types of workflow status events.

value.span: 、、，或空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: Either a , a , a , or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数工作流状态事件， 都是空引用 (`Nothing`)；但是，对于某些类型的工作流状态事件，运行时跟踪基础结构将使用 返回与工作流状态事件有关的附加数据。For most workflow status events, is a null reference (`Nothing`); however, for certain kinds of workflow status events the runtime tracking infrastructure uses to return additional data about the workflow status event. 下表列出了 值，这些值与在每个工作流状态事件的 中返回的这些特殊工作流状态事件和对象类型相对应。The following table lists the values that correspond to these special workflow status events and the type of object returned in for each of these workflow status events. | 值 Value| 对象 Object| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 该属性由运行时跟踪基础结构设置。This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

summary.span: 获取或设置与跟踪记录关联的工作流状态事件的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of workflow status event associated with the tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TrackingWorkflowEvent` 包含 值之一，指示由运行时跟踪基础结构匹配并导致发送 的工作流状态事件的种类。`TrackingWorkflowEvent` contains one of the values indicating the kind of workflow status event that was matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and caused the to be sent. 它反映工作流实例的当前状态。It reflects the current status of the workflow instance. 仅当工作流实例的状态发生更改时，工作流实例才会发出工作流状态事件，因此，仅当工作流状态发生更改时，才能匹配 。A workflow instance emits workflow status events only when the status of the workflow instance changes, and, therefore, a can be matched only when a workflow status change occurs. 该属性由运行时跟踪基础结构设置。This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
